name: Roaring 20s - Musical Button Bash
description:
Go back to the magical music era of the 1920s in this musical button bash.

Collect all the musical notes to let the old classic tracks play. Miss a note and it's back to square one.  This game can be played on desktop, laptop, mobile and tablet.

Controls for a keyboard:

Arrows and A and B when prompted.

Game features:

  • Visuals which look straight from pre gaming eva of the 1920s
  • Actual hits from a forgotten time
  • challenging but fun for all ages
  • 3 levels (easy medium and hard)
  • facts from about the artist feature in the game.

Made for the 'Game like it's 1926' Game Jam

Check out my other free games at www.gamesbyjack.co.uk and donate to the charity Mind if you enjoy what you play via the site.

Thanks,

Jack
